channel.title: boilerplate on Hugo O. Rivera
channel.description: Recent content in boilerplate on Hugo O. Rivera

item.title: cheatsheets
item.description: Toolkit for converting notes into compact PDFs suitable for quick reference sheets, cheatsheets, cribsheets, etc. Notes can be written in markdown, are rendered to PDF by Pandoc.

item.title: nodejs-api-starter
item.description: Boilerplate and tooling for authoring data API backends with Node.js and GraphQL. A personal fork.

item.title: ocaml-parsing
item.description: Boilerplate code for writing parsers in OCaml using Menhir + sedlex

item.title: pandoc-resume
item.description: Write a résumé in markdown and convert to PDF, DOCX, and HTML.
